otherNames: 我不过是个大罗金仙,I’m Just an Immortal,上古神尊降临都市,I'm Just a Big Luo Jinxian, Super God is Me
synopsis: [Introduction to the story] The male protagonist Lin Fei is an ancient deity in the world of cultivating immortals. Killed by a traitor, the murderer was a certain clan that he casually rescued five hundred years ago. What kind of conspiracy is hidden behind this? Watch how Lin Fei uses his strength to stage a series of hearty face-slapping scenes in the process of searching for the answer! In this era, people are always reincarnation, but I Lin Fei, depends on being immortal. I have lived for hundreds of million years, just to find my beloved ones that I lost for a million years!!
